channel.title: Hugo on Steve's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Steve's Blog

item.title: How to Build Blog With Hugo on Github
item.description: Hugo on your MacOS Setting github create a repo named blogs for store hugo programes. Create another repo named echowings.github.io to host websit. generate ssh key and regist it on github settings. Install hugo 1 2 brew install hugo Create a blog site. 1 2 hugo new site blogs init git 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 cd blogs git init #Add remote repo. git remote add
